annotations: Extract relevant information from diligence submitted by clients; attend weekly Zoom Meetings with attorneys and paralegals to discuss personal injury/mass tort case preparation: file complaints, summons, complying with litigation-specific procedures for summons and service; update DCM with client status and loss profile; interview clients and perform intake regarding damages and insurance coverage and shortfalls.

Drafted and reviewed terms of Contracts for Purchase and Sale of real and personal property; for multi-site, single-site, & multi-state transactions, reviewed title commitments & surveys; drafted title/survey objection letters; prepared spreadsheets to track outstanding title and survey issues; identified defective real estate instruments and legal descriptions; reviewed Escrow Instructions; drafted Deeds, Assignments of Leases, and Bills of Sale, and prepared other standard closing documents; reviewed Settlement Statements (HUDs); orchestrated closing with all parties to transaction, including brokers, lenders/lender's counsel, sellers/buyers, title companies, surveyors, etc.; managed all miscellaneous real estate administration matters, including obtaining property insurance certificates; reviewed loan documentation ancillary to Credit Agreements for financings of recent construction of improved properties; tracked properties identified for relinquishment/replacement for 1031 tax deferred exchanges; reviewed Closing Instructions and 1031 exchange documents; resolved post-closing matters and prepared closing binders; orchestrated resolution of various environmental regulatory and compliance issues with environmental agencies; prepared spreadsheets to track status of resolution of environmental compliance issues including Stage II testing; reviewed Phase I Environmental Reports; registered PSTs with various environmental agencies and Fire Marshall offices; applied for rezoning permits; applied for and managed transfer of ownership and location of liquor licenses at county, city, state, and federal level with alcohol regulatory agencies through closing; drafted gas station leases; drafted, negotiated, and amended non-petroleum leases (space leases, building leases, billboard leases, etc.); prepared UCC Financing Statements to perfect security interest in collateral; drafted all documentation and correspondence related to non-judicial foreclosure of deed of trust liens, including preparing for auctioning of collateral; transferred title of rolling stock; reviewed terms of UFOCs and Franchise Agreements of nationally-recognized restaurant companies and managed site approval process (contract administration).
San Diego State University - San Diego, CA
